column5: Went out with a friend yesterday and what a blast we had I went 8 for 14 and he went 3 for 5 .... And I got to brake in my new GLX 15" and my new islander  All fish went back  Just SOME pics for you guys                    Thanks for looking
Nice fish, this week has been great, !
Nice fish.  How do you like that chest pack? Does it have good storage space? I've been thinking of one to replace my wornout vest.
It"s the beat thing I have bought for float fishing comfortable and out of the way...storage space is good. you have the front and the back to use I give it a 10*
Nice job!  How did you like your new rod & reel?
Thanks  The rod and reel is out of this world the rod has so much power and can you get nice long drifts from the 15" the reel is so smooth it gets a boya lol
Any of you guys have a GLX 15" and what do you think of it ?
Some nice early spring steel Thanks for sharing Leechman
